LocationRemarks: northwest side, opposite south end of De Courcy Island, little bay, 100 m east of seashore.

LocationRemarks: northwest side, opposite south end of De Courcy Island, little bay, 100 m east of seashore.

SpecimenNotes: Few plants; becoming a frequent weed in grassy sites on the Gulf Islands.

LocationRemarks: northwest side, opposite south end of De Courcy Island, north side of little bay.

LocationRemarks: on west cliffs.
